title: Tobacco wants (t207's, t202's, T3's, P2's, T210)
author: obcmac

posts.post_title: Tobacco wants (t207's, t202's, T3's, P2's, T210)
posts.post_content:
Rather than continue to look through ebay, I thought I'd post my wants.  I'm mostly a low to ultra low grade collector...with some exceptions.  

Let me know if you have any available for sale or trade.

Thanks,

Mac


T3 Turkey Reds (1K max on cobb...nothing better than good)
4-6 9 28a (bklyn) 31 38-39 82 Bransfield 84 Browne 85 Burns 86 Carrigan 88 Covaleski 90a doolin 94 Gibson 97 Hoblitzell 99 Johnson 100 Jones 101 Keeler 104 Lennox 106 Lord 107 Manning 108 Merkle 112b (cin and p) 114 Rhoades 122a (NY) 122b (ny&b)

t207 prefer good or worse
Bauman,  Birmingham, Bushelman, Donlin, Fisher white, Hoff, Kuhn, Lange, 
Lewis, Irv, Lowdermilk, McCarthy, Miller w, Mogridge, Ray Morgan,  Perdue, Ragan, Rasmussen, Saier, Tinker, Tyler, Wallace,
White 14.18015 Wilson (p), Wood, Woodburn, Works

126 Too Late For Devlin (Devlin Giants, Mathewson)

T210 Series 3 (looking for cheap beaters)
